mst06.name: msg_shop
mst06.message:
I'm the owner here, Enrique.
Thanks for coming by! Well, take a look around. They're all valuable
items that I got through special channels. I'll do my best to find good products, so come by
once in a while and see what I've got! So, what do you want to buy?
Hey, you're back!\nWhat are you looking for today?

Surprised?
This is a "Network Shop." This is a new shop that was developed for
people who want to shop whenever they want! It's not only high-tech, it's on the cutting edge
of cool! Don't you think so? You can use this Network Shop to buy exactly
the same things that you can buy at my shop
in the Castle Town! Well, that's enough chitchat. What do you want
to buy?
Do you want to buy this?
Do you want to buy anything else?
It looks like you don't have enough Rings.\nSorry, but business is business.
Hey, I told you, you don't have enough Rings.
You don't have enough Rings!\nCome on, are you making fun of me?
Sorry, but I've sold out of everything I've\ngot in right now.\fI'll get some more products in soon, so come\nback later.
Hey, are you leaving already?\fCome again soon!
Sorry, I'm all sold out.\fSorry about that.\nWell, come by again to say hi!
Welcome!\fHmm... Sorry, but I don't have anything that really\nsuits you... \fBut thanks for coming!\nI'm Enrique. Don't forget me!

Hey, surprised?
This is a "Network Shop." "I want to shop whenever I want to!"
"I want to buy things wherever I want!"
"I want the cool things from Enrique's shop!" "I want to see Enrique whenever I want!"
"Enrique's too handsome for words!"
"I can't get enough of Enrique!" That's what people kept telling me, you see. So due to overwhelming public demand,
I developed this new type of shop! It's not only high-tech, it's on the cutting edge
of cool! Don't you think so? You can use this Network Shop to buy exactly
the same things that you can buy at my shop
in the Castle Town! Well, that's enough chitchat. What do you want
to buy?
Here, you can purchase items from "Enrique's\nShop" in the Soleanna Castle Town, via the\nnetwork.
Please select the product you would like to\npurchase.
Would you like to purchase this product?
Would you like to purchase anything else?
You do not have enough Rings.
Sorry, all items at this shop are sold out.
We are currently waiting for our next shipment.\fThe system cannot be used until the shipment\narrives.\fThank you for coming.
Sorry, all items you may be interested in\nare sold out.\fThank you for coming.
Sorry, it doesn't look like we carry any items you\nmay be interested in... \fThank you for coming.

Allows you to use the "Light
Dash." By using the Light
Dash, you can move quickly
through a trail of Rings.
Allows you to use "Sliding."\nBy sliding, you can attack\nenemies while moving.

Allows you to use the
"Bound Jump." This lets
you jump to higher places
and attack below you.

Allows you to use the
"Tornado" custom action.
Creates wind to attack
surrounding enemies.
Allows you to use the "Slow"\ncustom action. Slows the flow\nof time in the immediate area.

Allows you to use the "Mach
Speed" custom action. Enables
you to do a Supersonic
Boost Dash.

Allows you to use the "Homing
Smash" custom action. Enables
you to stop in midair, and
do a Homing Smash Attack.

Allows you to use the "Gun
Drive" custom action. Enables
you to throw an Gem
and teleport to that location.

Allows you to use the
"Thunder Guard" custom action.
Defends against attacks while
attracting nearby Rings.
Allows you to use the "Scale"\ncustom action.\nChanges Sonic's size.
???\nYou'll need to buy it to see\nwhat it does!

Allows you to use the "Light
Dash." By using the Light
Dash, you can move quickly
through a trail of Rings.

"Chaos Boost Level 1." 
During the boost you will be
granted "Chaos Snap," an 
upgrade to Chaos Attack 
and Chaos Smash.

"Chaos Boost Level 2." 
During the boost you will be
granted "Chaos Lance," an 
upgrade to Chaos Spear.

"Chaos Boost Level 3." 
During the boost you will be
able to activate
"Chaos Blast."

Allows you to use "Hold
Smash." This allows you
to throw what you have
grabbed in a single throw.

Allows you to use
"Grab-All." This allows
you to grab things in a
wider range.

Press the $ button twice
quickly to perform "Teleport
Dash." This allows you to do
instantaneous Teleport
Dashes.

Hold the $ button during jump
to perform "Psychoshock."
This allows you
to stun nearby
enemies and grab them.
Allows you to "Speed Up."\nThis increases your\nmovement speed.
